channel.title: Signlink ( Help )
channel.description: How do i customize the signlink for my client, so my server will be on the internet. Im on the signlink folder right now and it looks like its what needs to be changed but idk if i want to risk it. I also want to know if i do succesfully make the signlink work, wtf will it do? Will it apear on the page that i wanted it to, the way i wanted it to?

item.title: Signlink ( Help )
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Please make this clearer. And always make a copy of the file before you start messing with it.

Read full topic
